item.name: Cannot register with password too short

exec: pm.expect(response.message).to.include(`The password have to be at least ${minimumCharacters} characters long`);
pm.expect(response.message).to.include('Unauthorized to access this resource, login please');
pm.expect(response.message).to.include('Unauthorized to access this resource, login please');
pm.expect(response.message).to.eql('Unauthorized to access this resource, login please');
